data.name: RPG Sounds - Combat Music Expansion - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Combat Music is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music. It includes:

Music
  • Another Day Another Fight
  • Blind Fighting
  • Eternal Victory
  • Fist Shaped Scar
  • Full Metal
  • Traitors Will Pay

data.short_description: Combat Music is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
